title: Why Not Just Melt The Snow?
teaser: As a winter storm dumps even more snow on the Midwest and Northeast, we take a look at how snow-melting machines work.
contentencoded:
A winter storm is dumping another foot of snow on the Midwest and Northeast. The sidewalks are still piled high from last week’s blizzard, so some cities are saying enough with plowing, let’s melt it.

Snow Dragon Snowmelters does just that. The company’s director of sales and marketing, Jennifer Binney, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to explain how these massive machines work.

Guest

  • Jennifer Binney, director of sales and marketing for Snow Dragon Snowmelters.
